CustomField.description: This field can be used to automatically drive the Lifecycle Stage value for the account based upon the Account Stage mappings. Using the Engagio.AccountStatus__c provided via the Engagio app is recommended.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field can be used to automatically drive the Lifecycle Stage value for the account based upon the Account Stage mappings. Using the Engagio.AccountStatus__c provided via the Engagio app is recommended.
CustomField.label: Dash Account Status
